info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, southeastern Victoria and northeastern Refugio Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 556 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tivoli, or near McFaddin, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seadrift, Green Lake, Tivoli, Long Mott and Austwell. This includes US Highway 77 near mile marker 602. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
